title: ‘The Preparation Was Not Ideal’: How Red Bull Stuck by Roglič in Risky Vuelta Comeback
content:
Red Bull shakes off summer of setbacks with morale-boosting stage win and a return to red: 'There’s never a reason to doubt Primož Roglič.'

Read the full article at ‘The Preparation Was Not Ideal’: How Red Bull Stuck by Roglič in Risky Vuelta Comeback on Velo.
author: ahood
